posts.post_title: T206s HoFs, SL, Chase, EPDG ---ALL SOLD---
posts.post_content:
Posted By: JimB
I prefer to trade these for cards on my T206 wantlist in vg/ex or better (see below).  Cash prices are absolutely firm.  Prices are delivered in US.  E-mail with questions or trade lists.
JimB
james.blumenthal@oregonstate.edu

Evers $350 ----- TRADED-----
Marquard (EPDG) $130 -----SOLD -----
Jordan (vg)  $100  (minor back wrinkle that does not show on front) -----SOLD -----
Chase (fr)  $40 ----- SOLD-----

I guarantee the Jordan and Chase will grade.  Can't guarantee a specific numerical grade.  Guarantee good for 60 days.

[IMG]http://img120.imageshack.us/img120/8829/image1fz4.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://img120.imageshack.us/img120/5368/image3hm8.jpg[/IMG]
Note that Jordan and Chase switched sides in back scan.  Chase is P350-460.  Jordan is P350.
